016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.metricregistry;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.Gauge;
019import com.codahale.metrics.Metric;
020import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
021import com.codahale.metrics.MetricSet;
022import com.codahale.metrics.jvm.*;
023import com.sun.management.UnixOperatingSystemMXBean;
024import jakarta.inject.Inject;
025import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
026import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
027
028import java.lang.management.ManagementFactory;
029import java.lang.management.OperatingSystemMXBean;
030import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
031import java.util.Map;
032
033@Service(name="jvm")
034@RunLevel(4)
035public class JvmMetricsService {
036
037    @Inject
038    public JvmMetricsService(MetricRegistry metricRegistry) {
039        metricRegistry.registerAll("memory", new MemoryUsageGaugeSet());
040        metricRegistry.registerAll("threads", new ThreadStatesGaugeSet());
041        // jvmMetricRegistry.registerAll("threads", new CachedThreadStatesGaugeSet(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS));
042        metricRegistry.registerAll("runtime", new JvmAttributeGaugeSet());
043        metricRegistry.registerAll("gc", new GarbageCollectorMetricSet());
044        metricRegistry.register("fd", new XorceryFileDescriptorMetricSet());
045        metricRegistry.register("classes", new ClassLoadingGaugeSet());
046        metricRegistry.registerAll("buffers", new BufferPoolMetricSet(ManagementFactory.getPlatformMBeanServer()));
047    }
048
049    public static class XorceryFileDescriptorMetricSet implements MetricSet {
050        private static boolean unixOperatingSystemMXBeanExists = false;
051
052        static {
053            try {
054                Class.forName("com.sun.management.UnixOperatingSystemMXBean");
055                unixOperatingSystemMXBeanExists = true;
056            } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
057                // do nothing
058            }
059        }
060
061        final Map<String, Metric> metricByName;
062
063        public XorceryFileDescriptorMetricSet() {
064            final OperatingSystemMXBean os = ManagementFactory.getOperatingSystemMXBean();
065            metricByName = new LinkedHashMap<>();
066            if (unixOperatingSystemMXBeanExists && os instanceof UnixOperatingSystemMXBean) {
067                metricByName.put("utilization", new FileDescriptorRatioGauge());
068                metricByName.put("open", (Gauge<Long>) () -> {
069                    final UnixOperatingSystemMXBean unixOs = (UnixOperatingSystemMXBean) os;
070                    return unixOs.getOpenFileDescriptorCount();
071                });
072                metricByName.put("max", (Gauge<Long>) () -> {
073                    final UnixOperatingSystemMXBean unixOs = (UnixOperatingSystemMXBean) os;
074                    return unixOs.getMaxFileDescriptorCount();
075                });
076            }
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public Map<String, Metric> getMetrics() {
081            return metricByName;
082        }
083    }
084}
